00010 DockButton::DockButton(QWidget* parent)
00011     : QToolButton(parent)
00012 {
00013     _d.reset(new Aki::DockButtonPrivate(this));
00014     setToolButtonStyle(Qt::ToolButtonTextBesideIcon);
00015 }

00041 void DockButton::paintEvent(QPaintEvent* e)
00042 {
00043     if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
00044         QToolButton::paintEvent(e);
00045         return;
00046     }
00047 
00048     QStyleOptionToolButton option;
00049     initStyleOption(&option);
00050 
00051     QTransform tf;
00052 
00053     if (orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
00054         tf = tf.rotate(90);
00055     } else {
00056         tf = tf.rotate(-90);
00057     }
00058 
00059     option.icon = icon();
00060     option.rect.setSize(QSize(option.rect.height(), option.rect.width()));
00061 
00062     QPixmap pix(option.rect.width(), option.rect.height());
00063 
00064     QStylePainter painter(&pix, this);
00065     painter.fillRect(pix.rect(), option.palette.background());
00066     painter.drawComplexControl(QStyle::CC_ToolButton, option);
00067     painter.end();
00068 
00069     QPainter p(this);
00070 
00071     if (orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
00072         p.translate(0, height());
00073         p.rotate(-90);
00074     } else {
00075         p.translate(width(), 0);
00076         p.rotate(90);
00077     }
00078 
00079     p.drawPixmap(0, 0, pix);
00080 }

00083 {
00084     _d->hideable = hideable;
00085 }

00087 void DockButton::setDock(Aki::DockWidget* dock)
00088 {
00089     _d->dock = dock;
00090     Q_ASSERT(_d->dock);
00091     connect(dock, SIGNAL(mouseLeave()),
00092             SIGNAL(mouseLeave()));
00093     setIcon(_d->dock->icon());
00094     setText(_d->dock->title());
00095 }

00097 void DockButton::setOrientation(Qt::Orientation orientation)
00098 {
00099     _d->orientation = orientation;
00100 }

00102 QSize DockButton::sizeHint() const
00103 {
00104     ensurePolished();
00105 
00106     QStyleOptionToolButton option;
00107     initStyleOption(&option);
00108 
00109     QFontMetrics fm = fontMetrics();
00110     const int charWidth = fm.width(QLatin1Char('x'));
00111 
00112     QSize textSize;
00113 
00114     if (toolButtonStyle() != Qt::ToolButtonIconOnly) {
00115         textSize = fm.size(Qt::TextShowMnemonic, option.text);
00116         textSize.rwidth() += 2 * charWidth;
00117     }
00118 
00119     const int spacing = 2;
00120     int iconWidth = 0;
00121     int iconHeight = 0;
00122 
00123     if (toolButtonStyle() != Qt::ToolButtonTextOnly) {
00124         if (orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
00125             iconWidth = option.iconSize.height();
00126             iconHeight = option.iconSize.width();
00127         } else {
00128             iconWidth = option.iconSize.width();
00129             iconHeight = option.iconSize.height();
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     int width = 4 + textSize.width() + iconWidth + spacing;
00134     int height = 4 + qMax(textSize.height(), iconHeight) + spacing;
00135 
00136     if (orientation() == Qt::Vertical) {
00137         return QSize(height, width);
00138     }
00139 
00140     return QSize(width, height);
00141 }
